channel.title: Giving players 100k after update or when they login
channel.description: How do I add something like, when people login they get 100k?

item.title: Giving players 100k after update or when they login
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

Go into the vote for cash codes u added and find were it add cash cuz if they get cash for voting you just need to find were its at, and change to the amount you want to give them

item.title: Giving players 100k after update or when they login
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

[quote=“Marine5287, post:6, topic:399426”][quote author=Tobbescape link=topic=496557.msg3630379#msg3630379 date=1308168310]

Well basically, I added a vote4box, but i forgot adding rewards, so they got 1 gp everytime. I want to give them a few mill for voting so much and just getting junk.

Maybe add something like this into your command?

k ill try
[/quote]

Sorry, I didn’t mean to make the whole message a code. Here’s the code:

I ment like, outside the vote4box/cash.
So if they login, they get 10m without voting

Read full topic

item.title: Giving players 100k after update or when they login
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

[quote=“Marine5287, post:4, topic:399426”][code][quote author=Tobbescape link=topic=496557.msg3630368#msg3630368 date=1308167904]
Well basically, I added a vote4box, but i forgot adding rewards, so they got 1 gp everytime. I want to give them a few mill for voting so much and just getting junk.
[/quote]

Maybe add something like this into your command?

[codec.getItems().addItem(ITEM_ID, AMOUNT);][/code][/quote]
k ill try

Read full topic
item.source: Giving players 100k after update or when they login
